name: Super Slime Ben
description:
Use Ben 10’s alien heroes to battle your way through a wacky obstacle course in Super Slime Ben!

IT’S ABOUT SLIME
Run, jump and climb to outrun the slime! You’ll face flying slimeballs, enemy creatures, disappearing blocks, and many other hazards as you try to escape. How high can you make it before the slime overtakes you?

30 PLAYABLE CHARACTERS
Play as all ten of Ben’s alien heroes, including Four Arms, Heatblast, Diamondhead, XLR8, Cannonbolt, Shock Rock, Wildvine, Grey Matter, Stinkfly, and Overflow, PLUS Omni-Enhanced and crazy costumed versions of the aliens. There’s always someone new to unlock!

COLLECT HELPFUL CRITTERS
Chase down and collect a variety of critters with special powers that can help you survive longer and climb higher.

Help Ben 10 become the world’s greatest slimefighter in SUPER SLIME BEN!
